strapiPost.title: NWA Farmers Markets Coming Soon
strapiPost.content:
Spring is almost upon us and with the change in season comes a tradition unlike any other - Farmers Markets.

  • Coming soon: The Fayetteville Farmers Market will kick off this year with 2 “Spring Fling” markets on March 19 & 26. The regular season will begin on April 2. Traveling up north, the Bentonville Farmers Market will have its opening day on April 9. 
  • New year, new market: The Rogers Farmer’s Market underwent a recent name change to become the Rogers Local Food Market, and it is scheduled to re-open this May!

With more vendors, activations, and locations the NWA farmers markets will be something you wont want to miss.
